author: HemantMahawar
body:
List of things to fix:

- [ ] Provide a way to pick a specific item, when there is duplicate
- [ ] Return the path to about files, so users can decide which one to pick
- [ ] Return the version of Module for which the help is about

AFAIK, this issue will be hit when module authors are shipping about topics with the module. Users can have multiple version of the module installed, hence multiple about files ... so this should be fixes in a generic way.
 
Steps to reproduce
------------------
```powershell
# List the current module path
$env:PSModulePath

# find default help
get-help

# Look at the properties of default help
get-help | fl -f
```
Expected behavior
-----------------
```powershell
get-help

# Has a version column (from module version) for multiple entries
Name                              Category  Module                Synopsis               Version 
----                              --------  ------                --------                 -----------
default                           HelpFile                        SHORT DESCRIPTION
default                           HelpFile                        SHORT DESCRIPTION

# Returns Path, Module and Version properties
get-help | fl -f

Name          : default
Category      : HelpFile
Synopsis      : SHORT DESCRIPTION
Component     :
Role          :
Functionality :
Module :
Version :
Path :
Length        : 3565

Name          : default
Category      : HelpFile
Synopsis      : SHORT DESCRIPTION
Component     :
Role          :
Functionality :
Module :
Version :
Path :
Length        : 3565
```

------------------

```powershell
C:\Users\hemantm\Documents\PowerShell\Modules;C:\Program Files\PowerShell\Modules;c:\program files\powershell\6.0.0-beta.1\Modules

----                              --------  ------                    --------
default                           HelpFile                            SHORT DESCRIPTION
default                           HelpFile                            SHORT DESCRIPTION


get-help | fl -f

Name          : default
Category      : HelpFile
Synopsis      : SHORT DESCRIPTION
Component     :
Role          :
Functionality :
Length        : 3565

Name          : default
Category      : HelpFile

Role          :

Length        : 3565
```

title: Get-Help should provide a way for the users to display specific help item when there are duplicate
